definitions.definition: the written words in a book, magazine, etc., not the pictures:
examples: The book has 500 pages of text.
I'll send you a text as soon as I have any news.

definitions.definition: the exact words of a speech, etc.:
examples: Can we see the full text of your speech before Tuesday?

definitions.definition: a book or piece of writing that you study as part of a course:
examples: "Ulysses" is a set text for the exam.

definitions.definition: a sentence or piece of writing from the Bible that a priest or minister reads aloud in church and talks about
to send someone a text message by phone:
examples: I texted her to arrange a time to meet.
